name: Spooky House (adamgryu)
description:
Enter a spooky house, clear it of ghosts, and find your missing friend!

Made in 10 days during GBJAM 9.

TIP: The game remembers when you clear a room, and you don't have to clear them again after you die.

Controls:

  • Use the Arrow Keys to move.
  • Press Z to interact.
  • Press Alt+Enter to toggle fullscreen.

Credits:

  • Mark Sparling - Music and Sounds
  • Dawn B - Art
  • Andrew W - Art
  • Adam Robinson-Yu - Programming
  • Fonts from: https://chevyray.itch.io/pixel-fonts
